name: One-Two Pong
description:
Description

It is a two player local coop game based on the old Pong game from 1972 More with many improvements like:

  • Cool music based on old arcade games (I think it's cool)
  •  Minimalist graphics based on two colors red and blue

  • The player who scores the point has his platform reduced making his game  more difficult

  • New mechanics like: The ball increases in speed and decreases in size each time you block it, but if you do that too many times, DODGE!
Installation

Just run the installer and choose an install location of your choice and enjoy your game.

Controls Move Red   W       S  Move Blue up       Down Play E Restart R Confirm Enter
